mdRecord.dcterms:title: Vers, Graham (?) to "Dear Sir" (Faulds); 02 of 02
mdRecord.dcterms:description: 3. Doepner/Faulds--LettersItems 41-117--Scrapbook 2Vers, Graham (?) to "Dear Sir" (assume Henry Faulds) regarding an interest in Faulds's science experiences (specifically locating submarines with microphones), using science to train government officials, and commentary on Faulds's "story" of fingerprints.; 1 leaf; DF 870
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Faulds, Henry, 18431930
